name: Rollator
description: 70years old lady has limited mobility, she has to use wheelchair for long distances, she wants to have a rollator to practice walking so that she is able to walk more stably and be able to sit when she needs to rest.

name: Wheelchair
description: 65 years old Chinese female married and staying with her husband and daughter. Client is mostly homebound and is alone at home during the day, she experiences breathlessness whenever she ambulates in the Community. A wheelchair will help her to move around in the community.

name: wheelchair
description: Client and husband are both low-income earners, with 4 children, all aged below 16 years old. Their eldest son had recently injured himself, and recovery period is expected to be at least 6 months. The family had been encouraged to get a wheelchair to help with his mobility, but the family is unable to afford it. They are thus hoping to get a wheelchair to ease their son's recovery.(Kamie)
specifications: Able to withstand more than 105 kg

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Motorised Scooter
description:
Client is a cancer patient and staying alone. Client has some mobility issues. Thus, having a motorised scooter will allow client to go about his daily activities.

Note: Client can only use a motorised scooter that is able to support 100-150kg   in weight.

name: Elderly Toilet Side Bar Fixtures
description:
Female / 68 years old currently undergoing occupational therapy requires side bar fixtures for toilet. 

Fixtures such as:
1) Flip up Steel Grab Bar
2) FT Chrome Bathroom Grab Bar
3) Flip Up Shower Seat
4) Anti Slip Mats

Thank you! :)

name: Motorised Scooter
description: Patient (57/F) has difficulties walking due to frequent giddiness after dialysis and shortness of breath due to her health conditions. She has difficulty traveling on her own and hence she would usually not be able to go out much unless someone accompanies her. Hence having a motorised scooter will increase her ease of access in the community and allow her to travel safely and independently.

name: Wheelchair battery
description: Client is a 49-year-old woman living with her wheelchair-bound husband (M/67). Client is unemployed and does not receive any financial support from her family. Her husband is retired, and they have been surviving on his monthly CPF payouts. Her husband’s battery for his motorised wheelchair is faulty and they have not been able to replace it due to financial constraints. A donation of a wheelchair battery will be greatly appreciated. Thank you. (Liyana)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Motorised Wheelchair
description: Client is a 50+ year old lady (Amputee) is looking for a motorised wheelchair so that she can move about independently, and care for her son who suffers from Autism. Family faces financial constraints to afford a motorised wheelchair.

contact.org: MWS Covenant Family Service Centre - Hougang
contact.name: Reina Chantelle Reyes

name: Electric Wheelchair
description: Client has difficulties walking due to being in a road accident months back. Due to difficulty walking, client would usually stay in the room and not go out. Having a motorised wheelchair/ scooter will allow client to be able to be more independent and less isolated as he can move around by himself

name: Children clothes
description: A low-income family would like to have some second-hand clothes for its 4-year-old daughter who is about 105cm tall. Slightly bigger is fine too.

name: Milk, Cereal, Diapers (For 6months)
description:
Mother is suffering from chronic health and has a young child aged 2yo. Father is the sole breadwinner and earns low wages.
Family will require practical milk and diapers help for the child for next 6 months. Child has respiratory problem hence requires 2 different milk.
Usage per month: 3 packs of diapers, 3 tins each for 2 different milk, 3 tins of cereal. Please contact me for the specific brands required (Appreciate donor to cover delivery and send to client house). Thank you.

name: Small Playpen for toddlers
description: Single mother with her 4-year-old toddler has finally moved into their 2rm rental flat after facing homelessness since May 2021. name: Drypers Drypants XL x 4 Packs

name: 10 packets X10kg double FairPrice Thai Hom Mali premium quality fragrant rice
description: We are requesting for 10 packets of 10kg double FairPrice Thai Hom Mali premium quality fragrant rice as we cook 3 meals a day for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

name: CCTV and installation
description: Client is a single mother of 4 school going children who is going through divorce with abusive husband that is being incarcerated and about to release. She is requesting for donors to sponsor CCTV and installation outside her door due to fears of her and children's safety due to likelihood of husband returning to look for them to demand for access to children or possible revenge. The family has chronic financial issues due to ct difficulties working due to mental health condition and the kind donation will keep the family more at ease in view of hb's pending release in Dec 2021 and will support in ensuring their safety.

name: Drypers  L size x 10

Income has been irregular due to spouse's involvement for caregiving and other medical related needs of twins. Spouse is presently attending part-time course to increase employability. The absence at work has affected the family's financial stability and means. FSC is hopeful to look at short-term provision of diapers for the family of up to 5 months (Oct '21 to Feb '22).

Rice

Household items

name: Food Ration and Fresh Veg
description: Client is wheelchair bounded and lives no her own while her spouse is incarcerated. She is financially struggling and is dependent on financial assistance. She has been struggling to get her veg and rations due to her mobility issues and lack of assistance. She would benefit from the donation of food ration and veg.

name: Groceries
description: Family of five are facing financial constrains. They would need help to purchase some Halal groceries: Milk individually packed x2 sets of 6, eggs x2, cheese x1, nuggets x1, sliced bread x1, frozen prata x1. They would also require ART test kits x5.

name: Groceries, laundry & toiletries
description: Client, her husband and their young daughter who is in childcare require assistance with their groceries, laundry items and toiletries. Any assistance would be extremely helpful for the family as they are feeling demotivated in being unable to afford their basic necessities. Groceries: 1) Eggsx1tray,2)Onionsx1bag, 3)Potatoesx1bag, 4)Sardinex2Tin, 5)Chickenx1pack, 6)Farmhouse UHT Fresh Milkx6packs, 7)Wholemeal breadx1pack.Laundry Items:1)Fab downy 4.5kgx1, 2)Softlanx2,3)Dish washer detergent Brand GLOx2bottle(Due to skin sensitivity). Toiletries:1)Safi Shaylax1,2)Darlie Toothpastex2,3)Dove Shower Gelx2. Items will be directly sent to beneficiary's place and please contact us for details (email:dik@childrensociety.org.sg, contact:9436 7401). Thank you for your kind initiative!

name: Glucerna & Ensure Milkpowder for Seniors
description: Wishlist is for both Glucerna & Ensure. Client and spouse are unemployed, blue Chas cardholder. Client is diabetic and hopes for assistance to assist with their regular expenses through purchase of the above milk powder. Client and spouse consumes about 1.5 tins per 2 months or 9 tins each per year.

name: Mobile Phone
description: The beneficiary is in need of a mobile phone. No preference on the brand - phone preferable to have basic functions (eg. Call, whatsapp, camera etc). Please contact us for delivery details (email:dik@childrensociety.org.sg,contact:9436 7401). Thank you.

name: Diapers and food ration
description: Mother of two young children ages 5 and 3 is in need of XXL Drypants diapers and food ration for the family. Mother has a medical condition which makes her unfit for work. She is also separated from her husband due to safety concerns. As such, she is financially tight as he is not supporting the household.

name: Handphone & LCD monitor
description: Low income client seeking help to replace mobile phone and LCD monitor screen.

name: Multi Tier Cats Cage
description:
Client has many cats and would like to house them well so they would not be urinating around the house. 
She is considering to put some up for adoption.

name: Smart Phone (iPhone preferred)
description: Client is an elderly single male staying in a rental flat. Currently unemployment and seeking to find job. As rental flat does not have a home line, seeking job is challenging without a phone. Current phone was damaged due to an accident in a park and client is used to iPhone and does not know how to operate Android phones.

name: Urgent/ Short term - Help with halal meals for family on quarantine
description: A family with 3 young children are placed on home quarantine until 29/9 and they have lack of informal support to purchase meals. Mother is feeling stressed in taking care of the children on her own at home. The family is residing in a rental flat as they have financial difficulties. Any help with providing meals delivery will be a great support to help the family tide through this period. Pls whatsapp me at 68010718 if it is more convenient. Thank you very much.

name: Vouchures
description: Our children and families under care of Children Outreach @ Children's Society are currently in need of food, grocery and study items. Due to the variety needs of the families and various ages of the children, it is better to give out vouchers to the families directly for them to make the purchase themselves. Currently in need of 1) $200 NTUC vouchers, 2)$200 Popular Vouchures,3)$200 Restaurant or food vouchers (family friendly and halal certified), all in denominations of $5 or $10 with at least 6 months validity. The vouchers will be sent to the centre and please contact us for delivery details (email:dik@childrensociety.org.sg, contact:9436 7401 ). Thank you!

name: Wearable Tracking Device for 22yo lady with Special Needs
description: Client has been diagnosed with Down Syndrome and is a student of MINDS. She lives with her mother (single mother) and another brother. There have been multiple incident of client being reported missing after she wanders off on her own. A wearable tracking device is requested to enable mother to check on client's location as client does not bring a phone out of the house. Interested donor, please contact worker at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you very much!

name: Enfapro A+ Infant Stage 1 Milk Powder
description: The baby needing the milk does not take other forms of milk well. However, this milk powder is more expensive. The baby is currently being cared for by a family friend, as the biological mother is incarcerated shortly after the baby's birth. Hence, the milk powder will help the guardian (who is a single mother) to provide for the baby's basic needs.

A second-hand one is perfect!

name: Fresh Food Ration

Their two children are under the age of 3 years old. Please only respond if you are agreeable to support with fresh food rations as there are young children who need nutritious rations. A request list will be provided. Thank you for your understanding.

name: Tablets with 4G function
description: Our research unit are in need of 4 numbers of tablets to use for upcoming data collection with family participants. Tablets can come with 4G function and able to access Wifi/mobile data to connect to the internet. No specific brand and second hand is welcomed as long as the tablet is decently usable (not extremely laggy) and can be used to access the internet via wifi/data. Preferably a screen size of 8-inch and above. Unfortunately tablets will be needed as a laptop would not be ideal as it is not portable or touch-screen. The items will be sent to the centre and please contact us for delivery details (email: dik@childrensociety.org.sg, contact: 9436 7401). Thank you for your kind and generous support.

name: Fridge
description: Client and husband form a low-income household with their 3 children. Her husband is the sole breadwinner while client takes on a part-time course while juggling her caregiving responsibilities. Recently, their fridge broke down, which affects their ability to keep food for longer periods of time. This means that at times, their food or meals are spoiled, which adds further burden to their financial constraints. Having a replacement fridge would thus ensure that their basic needs are met adequately daily. Halal fridge required, preferably new.

name: Wall Fan

The family does not have enough for additional expense and recently, her wall fan is not functioning as well and is making it too noisy for her, causing her to feel even sicker and it gives her a headache and heavy migraine. A new fan would provide the comfort for recovery.

name: Washing Machine
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) is living in a rental flat and requires a second-hand washing machine as his current one is spoilt. 

     

On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a second-hand washing machine (top load). 

   

If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Caseworker Yu Xin at 8292 2205. We appreciate it if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s home directly at Circuit Road. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: CCTV for 22yo lady with Special Needs
description: Client has been diagnosed with Down Syndrome and is a student of MINDS. She lives with her mother (single mother) and another brother. Her mother has expressed concerns of client being unsupervised at home for about 4 hours as client's programme ends in the late afternoon while mother's work ends at night. There has been an incident of client using lighters at home and almost set the flat on fire. Mother has attempted to remove all hazardous items at home, but is concerned about similar incidents. Two CCTVs are requested to enable mother to check on client in the day even while working. Interested donor, please contact worker at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you very much!

name: Adult Bicycle
description: Client is a 62 male who is currently homeless and sleeping in the open. Client is seeking employment but worries about transport and hopes to have a working bicycle so he can cycle to work. Client is familiar with foldable bicycle or MTB.

name: Adult Bicycle
description: Client has just found a job and requires a bicycle to commute to her workplace and also explore doing gran food delivery so that she could support the family.

name: Bicycle
description: The client is struggling with his mental health and finds it difficult to leave the house. However, he finds it less intimidating to leave his home on a bicycle. Riding the bicycle not only brings him from one point to another but it also helps him to better cope with his mental health. Donors please kindly contact his social worker Reuben at reubenyue@carecorner.org.sg or contact him at 6365 8751 if you wish to donate.

name: Kitchen Aprons
description:
THK Pan-Disability Centre is a Sheltered Workshop for adults with special need. We provide vocational training in the hopes to ready them for the open job market.

In 2020, we started a baking track. As it is very well received, clients on our baking track have increase tremendously. Therefore, we are looking for more kitchen aprons for the clients. We are requesting for a minimum of 20 pieces 

Do reach out to us for further enquiries and clarifications.
